  1. In a message input box (center channel or RHS), type "/dialog" and hit "Enter"
inline.expectedResult: • Interactive dialog modal opens and ephemeral post confirming you used the slash command to open the dialog is made

inline.description: 1. In the "Email" field, type something random like "abcdefg"
inline.expectedResult: • You should see a red error message positioned below the help text of the "Email" field saying "Must be a valid email address."
